context: Analyze this supine backbend pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Bridge Pose (Setu Bandha Sarvangasana) Backbend lying on back with feet on ground. Consider the Glute strength, heart opening, hip flexor stretch. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Backbend lying on back with feet on ground
practitioner.primaryFocus: Glute strength, heart opening, hip flexor stretch

specificNeeds: Glute strength, heart opening, hip flexor stretch
